Articles.Content:
i have a challange for you! create a space base on a planet! rules: create a screenshot of your base! you can make a video too!

modes:

simple= create a base on kerbin

normal= create a base on the mun

hard= create a base on bop or gilly

hardcore= create a base on the ocean of laythe!

free= create a base where you want it!

post what gamemode you used too!
